name: Yellow Lily Flower Pearl Bracelet
description:
☆Designed with our signature hand-sculpted clay flower.

☆Designed with silver-plated links of Swarovski CRYSTALLIZED™ Elements Glass Pearls.

☆Available up to 8" (LEAVE YOUR SIZE AT CHECKOUT).

☆ AVAILABLE IN CHILD SIZES TOO!
0-24months - 5" 
2 -6yr old - 5.5" 
8-12yr old - 6" 
12-14yr old - 6.5"

☆Arrives gift wrapped 

♥MADE-TO-ORDER♥

♥ABOUT OUR HAND-SCULPTED CLAY JEWELRY:
All of our signature clay flowers are hand-sculpted from the finest clay and are made to order, they are available in custom colors. Due to the handmade process of our clay flowers, the photos are samples, our flowers will vary in color & formation. It is intended in the design process that each of our clay jewelry pieces have a distinct identification and are one-of-a-kind. They are lightweight pendants.

name: Purple Flower Necklace
description:

~Our Signature Hand-Sculpted Clay Flower(available in a variety of custom colors, need a custom color feel free to contact us).

~Antique Brass links of Stone White Quartzite Stones

Available in sizes 19" to 22" (LEAVE YOUR SIZE AT CHECKOUT).

name: Fuchsia Flower Crystal Necklace
description:
ABOUT OUR HAND-SCULPT FLOWER NECKLACE- Our flower necklace is designed from our signature hand-sculpted clay flowers, the flowers are on antique silver lacey filigree and accented with gunmetal links of crystal faceted beads.

~2 Hand-sculpt clay flowers( If you would like your flowers in custom colors please leave your choices at checkout. Feel free to use the sample color chart).

~Gunmetal links of crystal faceted beads 

~Gunmetal chain & clasp, lead & nickel free. 

~Available in sizes 18 1/2" to 22"(LEAVE YOUR SIZE AT CHECKOUT).

~Arrives gift wrapped ready for gift giving.

{ B R I D A L ♥ W E D D I N G S - ORDER MULTIPLE IN ADVANCE }
♥BRIDESMAIDS ORDERS ARE SCHEDULED FOR DESIGN, 4 WEEKS COMPLETION♥


{ R U S H }
